name: Rock Hopper
description:
Guide Freddie though the cave as you collect treasure, but remember to avoid the falling rocks!

Rockhopper is the andriod remake of a 1982 amiga game, this version contains the first level only. Use the virtual joypad to move around. Each step you take eliminates some ground. Rocks will fall if they have no ground supporting them, so be careful! Try to collect every treasure before the time runs out.

This game was made in a week as a gift to the original developer.
